document.full_text: as companies continue to collect more data about their users, they need to be held accountable for breaches of that data, experts opine. but just how is that going to happen?
document.title: holding companies accountable for privacy breaches
lines_and_colors: as companies continue to collect more data about their users, they need to be held accountable for breaches of that data, experts opine. but just how is that going to happen?
